alert.note: Alert for Dalton Highway Summits (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 10:59PM AKST until December 24 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility occuring. Visibility one half mile or less at times. East winds gusting to 45 mph. Snow accumulation up to 1 inch. * WHERE...Dalton Highway Summits. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...East winds gusting to 45 mph are causing blowing snow with low visibility over Dalton Highway Summits. Falling snow will develop Sunday. Conditions will improve Sunday night as winds decrease.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
